name: Amberskull
description: Amberskull is a survival horror anthology with several terrifying experiences where you must overcome 4 unique enemies in widely different environments.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 (3.4 GHz) / AMD A8-7600 (3.1 GHz) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660 / AMD R9 270 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
